column4: I'm a noob to ubuntu, has anyone managed to get sound working on feisty fawn I have a ATI intergrated card
my card works out of the box.
you can do an experiment... burn a livecd of Gutsy, the Ubuntu's next release that still alpha too boot up and check if it supports your card, if it is a too recent released soundcard.
It does not makes sense to me but gutsy is not expected to work always.
